ARABIC: كَذَٰلِكَ يَطْبَعُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: In that way Allah seals up the hearts of those who do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That is how God seals the hearts of those who do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thus does Allah seal the hearts of those who have no knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Thus does God seal the hearts of those who do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is how Allah sets seal upon the hearts of the ignorant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Thus does Allah seal up the hearts of those who know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Thus does Allah set a seal on the hearts of those who do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Even so God seals the hearts of those that know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thus doth Allah seal the hearts of those who know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: In this way God seals the hearts of those who do not [want to] know [the truth],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: In this wise Allah sealeth the hearts of those who believe not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Thus does Allah seal the hearts of those who do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Thus does Allah seal up the hearts of those who understand not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Thus does Allah seal up the hearts of those who know not [the proofs and evidence of the Oneness of Allah i.e. those who try not to understand true facts that which you (Muhammad SAW) have brought to them].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: As such Allah seals the hearts of those who do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: God thus seals the hearts of those who do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Thus does Allah seal the hearts of those who do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [30:59] Thus does God seal the hearts of those who do not know, [anything of] God’s Oneness, in the same way that He has sealed the hearts of these [aforementioned individuals].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Thus doth Allah seal the hearts of those who know not) Allah's divine Oneness and disbelieve in it.
